ohuge prakashayakata anuwa, ohu ewaka ema eekakaye sthanadhipathi polis parikshaka samudra sudesh wijesinhage wachika niyogaya matha, 2012.05.20 dina thawath polis niladhariyeku samanga boralla polis sthanaye pihituwa thibena aparadha sthana parikshanagaraya (ිdajada) wetha gos thajudinge parikshanawalata adala chayarupa sahitha sidi thati ragena with adala usas niladhariyata (samudra wijesinha) laba di thibe.
